price: 12. Kaadu Yalli yeemeneh yan mará ceelallo yoogorech baxxaqise, Maryam Qimraan baxay isi sammo dalwak dacrissê caalatal, tokkel Yalli Jibriil amriseh diriqik moyya как culta aracak fuffu teetik ixxic kaak iyyech, woo fuñó tet maxax (maganat) toofeeh wonna luk is Nabii Qiisal tussukuqqeeh, is isi Rabbi qangor kce kay kitooba nummasseeh, Yalla oggola maray qibaada kaah caglisak tiyak teyna tekke.
arabic: وَمَرۡيَمَ ٱبۡنَتَ عِمۡرَٰنَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَحۡصَنَتۡ فَرۡجَهَا فَنَفَخۡنَا فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِنَا وَصَدَّقَتۡ بِكَلِمَٰتِ رَبِّهَا وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَكَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِتِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamaryama ib'nata ʿim'rāna allatī aḥṣanat farjahā fanafakhnā fīhi min rūḥinā waṣaddaqat bikalimāti rabbihā wakutubihi wakānat mina al-qānitīna
